summary: A test program that validates the functionality of ap_find_list_item in Apache httpd. It prompts users to enter a field value and search items, then displays whether each search item exists in the field value.

logs.message_template: Enter field value to find items within:
logs.reason: Prompts the user to input a string that will be searched through
Prompts the user to input a string to search for in the previously entered field value
Displays the search term and whether it was found in the field value (Yes or No)
Dummy implementation of Apache's logging function that does nothing in this test program
logs.resolution: This is intentionally empty for testing purposes, no resolution required
